alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:02AM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with higher amounts of 4 to 8 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Page and Valle. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 1 AM Today to noon Today: Grand Canyon 4 to 6 inches North Rim 5 to 9 inches Page 0 to 1 inches Valle 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
